Entry.JapaneseText: ……ったく、この階段の多さ、 ハンパじゃないぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Geez, the amount of stairs is insane.

Entry.JapaneseText: 街は山頂付近にある上に、ここは 登りやすいようゆるやかに作られている。
Entry.EnglishText: Since the town is close to the mountaintop, they built this place gently so that the climb would be easier.

Entry.JapaneseText: 階段の数が増え、通路が長くなるのは 仕方あるまい。
Entry.EnglishText: So it was unavoidable that there would be a large number of stairs and long corridors.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああーッ、もーッ!! 階段見るのも、ウンザリだーッ！
Entry.EnglishText: Ack! I can't take this! I'm sick of looking at these stairs!
